SENT.plain: Authors report a scarce case of association in stomatologic and otorhinolaryngologic area

After a general study of this type of association, in which the average of 6,8% of carcinoma is usually admitted in lymphocytic leukemia, a case of lymphocytic nodular lymphoma, a disease very close to chronic lymphocytic leukemia, is reported with secondary discovering of an epithelioma
Importance of detection must be underlined, and the treatment of carcinoma is discussed
